Archimonde replaces Kazzak

Special Unit (Ranged)
-20% buy cooldown

summons 3 Infernals for 30-90 sec

towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in every 2nd wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)
(can detect invisible in 900 AoE)

Lv1: has Ravage (20% critical strike)
deals 2x/2.5x/3x/3.5x damage
(affects organic non-Hero units only)
Lv2: has Feral Roar (bonus damage)
+15%/+20%/+25% damage in 500 AoE
(affects organic units only)
Lv3: has Howl of Terror (damage debuff)
-20%/-25% damage in 500 AoE
(affects organic non-Hero units only)
Lv4: has Deafening Roar (slow for 6 sec)
-25% speed in 400 AoE
(affects organic units only)

qi.name: Silithid
description:
Silithid

Units:
+1.5 HP/sec regeneration
-30% buy cooldown
-10% attack rate
+10% Hero buy cooldown

Buildings:
+25% HP/sec regeneration
no armor increase with building level

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Traits: Swarm of hive minded insects with dedicated roles. Lacking full sentience, thus having no mages or casted spells. Spawns more units from infected enemies. Ruled by few humanoid overlords.

Difficulty: Advanced

sa.name: Saurok
description:
Saurok

Units:
+3 HP/s regeneration
-30% buy cooldown
-5% hit points
-4 armor

Buildings:
+10% attack rate
-10% hit points

Magic:
Stasis Ward (2 sec stun, 60 sec ward)
Healing Ward (+9 HP/s for 6 sec)
Serpent Ward (1 ward for 30 sec)

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Traits: Savage, primitive and very aggressive Dragon worshiping cult. Utilizes placeable wards instead of true magic spells. Inconsistent and unreliable unit defence which mostly relies on pure luck.

Difficulty: Skilled

Saurok

Units:
+3 HP/s regeneration
-30% buy cooldown
-5% hit points
-4 armor

Buildings:
+10% attack rate
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+10% research speed

Magic:
Stasis Ward (2 sec stun, 60 sec ward)
Healing Ward (+9 HP/s for 6 sec)
Serpent Ward (1 ward for 30 sec)

Traits: Savage, primitive and very aggressive Dragon worshiping cult. Utilizes placeable wards instead of true magic spells. Inconsistent and unreliable unit defence which mostly relies on pure luck.

Difficulty: Skilled

ta.name: Tauren
description:
Tauren

Units:
+10% hit points
+1 HP/sec regeneration
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Traits: Slow and steady wins the race! It is not about dealing damage, its about outliving enemy. Damage output rises slowly and peaks in late game. It depends on brute force and so cannot be denied or dispelled.

Difficulty: Advanced

Tauren

Units:
+10% hit points
+1 HP/sec regeneration
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Magic:
Spirit Link (2 units share 15% damage)
Impale (125 damage, 1 sec stun)
Ancestral Spirit (revives 1 unit)

Traits: Slow and steady wins the race! It is not about dealing damage, its about outliving enemy. Damage output rises slowly and peaks in late game. It depends on brute force and so cannot be denied or dispelled.

Difficulty: Advanced

un.name: Undead
description:
Undead

Units:
-30% buy cost
-30% buy cooldown
-10% Hero buy cooldown
6 HP/sec regeneration on Blight
No HP regeneration outside Blight
-10% attack rate
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
-5% cost

Traits: Quantity over quality. Most units are very weak and depend on high numbers rather than strength. Very susceptible to AoE magic damage. But they are cheap so spawn them often.

Difficulty: Expert
